text: But if I start to say anymore saf might send someone to bring me to Gedong
Opposition would naturally have a tougher time fulfilling the requirements for GRC
They need to scramble to find people  assembling a weaker team
That's the underlying reason of course
Incumbent on the other hand would be able to insert unknown MPs into a team  lead by a popular candidate
No need 90 good incumbent candidates to fight for 90 single seats
